job_title: SAP Business Systems Analyst (Order Management & Execution)
jd: Hi,Hope you are doing well, Please find the job description below for the role of SAP Business Systems Analyst (Order Management & Execution) and let me know if you are interested. Role: Business Systems Analyst (Order Management & Execution)Location: Fremont CA Job Responsibilities:Collaborates with LAM Global Information Systems (GIS) teams to understand and support their operational requirements, developing and integrating interface solutions from SAP ECC to SAP S/4.Ability to connect multiple operations domains (Planning, Fulfillment, Supply Chain, Manufacturing, Logistics) and their interdependencies in solution design, build & test phasesCollaborate with the BU & GIS in leveraging various Operations Planning & Execution systems (SAP ECC, Custom applications in SAP ECC, SAP IBP, Kinaxis, BI/Dashboards, etc.) to enable the organization's future-state business capabilitiesTracking and driving tasks to closure and escalate as required Skills Required:Demonstrated experience writing software requirements and test specificationsAbility to understand business functionality and translate into business use casesStrong understanding of basic system engineering, object-oriented design, information risk and security guidelines, and system architecture standardsExperience with both waterfall and agile project management methodologies, and ability to deliver on responsibilities during various project phases including:Planning (Blueprint and Spec)Designing (Writing Specs and prototyping)Test Plans (Unit Testing and User acceptance testing)Training/Documentation (Roll-out)Cut-over Project Closure (Post-Mortem)Able to manage multiple tasks with competing prioritiesDemonstrated cross functional dependencies expertiseMust be able to demonstrate the skills and ability to build effective and productive relationships within and outside the immediate team Minimum Qualifications:7+ years overall SAP experience with 3+ years of experience with MM, PP, SD (VC)Plans and executes unit, integration and acceptance testing to deploy capabilitiesHave led in at least one end-to-end project, that included: Analysis, design, configuration, development build, test, and deployment, including training and data conversionStrong problem solving and analytical/critical thinking skillsStrong oral and written communication skillsStrong interpersonal skillsAbility to work independently or with limited direction Additional Qualifications:Previous Experience with SAP S/4Conversion experience from SAP ECC to SAP S/4 and other applications a plus.
